Title: Powerless
Writer: Joe Casey, Joe Kelly, Jack Kirby (comic book), Steven T. Seagle, Joe Simon (comic book), Danielle Wolff
Actors: JB Blanc, Eric Loomis, Graham McTavish, Chris Cox
Plot: When The Enchantress magically weakens Thor, Iron Man and Captain America, only Hawkeye is unaffected as the Wrecking Crew and Loki in the Destroyer body pursue them.
